alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Rankin, southeastern Hinds and south central Madison Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Byram, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jackson around 600 PM CDT. Richland around 610 PM CDT. Pearl around 620 PM CDT. Flowood around 630 PM CDT. Ridgeland around 640 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Mississippi.
